record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: The weight of the field for risk calculation.
Field weights normally fall between 1 and 5.
Service Manager uses this field in conjunction with the weight.factor field during Change Management processing.

detail.detail: Service Manager determines the Risk Value of each field by field.weight * weight.factor.
The results of each fields Risk Value are averaged (total risk value/total number of field) and rounded to the nearest whole number.
Service Manager passes this value back to the calling application (normally Change Management).
